title: Gamification and AI-Driven Personalized Adaptive Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts (functions, calculus, statistics) and digital device application skills
context.additional_context: Hybrid system combining AI analytics tools with gamification elements for personalized learner feedback, utilizing BYOD for real-time data collection and application

learning_goals: Learners solve AI-generated personalized problems with 85% or higher accuracy.
Learners improve learning engagement by 20% or more using gamification elements (achievement badges, leaderboards).
Learners accept and follow system-recommended learning paths based on learner profiles (cognitive abilities, preferences, grades) at a rate of 90% or higher.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
